title: Introducing: Dead Girlfriends
content:
One of my favourite artists of recent years, Elite Gymnastics, have sadly just announced that they’re now ‘a defunct project’, however James Brooks, the mastermind behind the EG, has revealed his new project, the controversially titled Dead Girlfriends (artwork by Grimes).

Announcing the project with a four track EP, it’s a cross between the elegant, synth heavy weirdness of EG, and a rawer, but no less beautiful, dip into the poetic honesty of Casiotone For The Painfully Alone. Whether it’s the lush instrumental of omertá or the cutting, cynicism of stop pretending, there’s more than enough in Dead Girlfriends to show that Brooks has far from drained of his creative talents. Check out the stop pretending EP below, including the best every use of the lyric ‘ugh’.
